Title: The Low-Redshift Lyman Continuum Survey I:
       New, Diverse Local Lyman-Continuum Emitters 
Authors: Flury S.R., Jaskot A.E., Ferguson H.C., Worseck G., Makan K., 
         Chisholm J., Saldana-Lopez A., Schaerer D., McCandliss S., Wang B.,
         Ford N.M., Heckman T., Ji Z., Giavalisco M., Amorin R., Atek H., 
         Blaizot J., Borthakur S., Carr C., Castellano M., Cristiani S.,

Table: HST/COS observation log for the LzLCS
================================================================================
Byte-by-byte Description of file: apjsac5331t1_mrt.txt
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   Bytes Format Units Label  Explanations
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   1- 15 A15    ---   ID     Object identifier
  17- 26 F10.6  deg   RAdeg  Right Ascension in decimal degrees (J2000)
  28- 36 F9.6   deg   DEdeg  Declination in decimal degrees (J2000)
  38- 43 F6.4   ---   z      Spectroscopic redshift
  45- 50 A6     ---   Visit  Visit identifier
  52- 61 A10    ---   Date   Observation date; YYYY-MM-DD
  63- 71 F9.3   s     Exp    Exposure time
  73- 75 I3     ---   Num    Average number of dark current observations (1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Note (1): Used to model the background dark current in each visit.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
